homepage.title: Nalan AI
homepage.subtitle: AI-powered patient triage system for rapid assessment, risk prioritization, and seamless healthcare management.

patientCard.title: I am a Patient
patientCard.description: Get an instant AI assessment and risk analysis.

doctorCard.title: I am a Doctor
doctorCard.description: View prioritized patient queue and AI insights.

triage.chatSubtitle: Smart assessment for immediate health guidance.
triage.welcome: Hello! I'm your health triage assistant. Please select your symptoms below or describe how you feel.
triage.placeholder: Describe other symptoms or details here...
triage.placeholderDetails: Enter medications, history, or other details...
triage.highRisk: I see some concerning symptoms. To analyze this accurately, I need more detail. Please list any medications you're taking and your medical history.
triage.success: I have logged this assessment to your records. You can view your history in the dashboard.
triage.error: I'm sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
triage.disclaimerText: This AI assessment is for informational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Call emergency services immediately if you are experiencing a life-threatening situation.

chatbot.title: Nalan Assistant
chatbot.greeting: Hello! I'm Nalan Assistant. How can I help you today?
